components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: 500 Errors in the Console After Completing Payments Successfully

incident_updates.body: We are investigating an issue with billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with the console potentially showing 5xx errors. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issues With Toll-free Verification Status Change Webhooks in Event Streams

incident_updates.body: Event streams status change webhook for Toll Free verification subscription is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with event streams status change webhook for Toll Free verification subscription. Customers can still receive email notifications of toll-free verification” status changes and retrieve a toll-free verification’s status via the Messaging Compliance API. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue webhooks notifications of TrustProduct status changes. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Moov Network in Gabon

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Moov Network in Gabon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - US Cellular

incident_updates.body: The US Cellular network in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 20 September 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 21 September 2023 at 01:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US Cellular US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Three UK, H3G Austria, and Wind (Tre) Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 20 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 21 September 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK, H3G Austria and Wind (Tre) Italy customers.Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup SIM Swap - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup Identity Match - Three UK, Wind (Tre) Italy

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 September 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 22 September 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, September 23rd, 2023, at 1:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Deutsche Telekom

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Deutsche Telekom is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 24 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Deutsche Telekom customers.
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 24 September 2023 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent disconnections and call failures to and from Singapore phone numbers.

Our SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent SMS delays delivering to and from France handsets via a subset of France longcodes.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 26 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio’s France phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 September 2023 at 04:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio Australia phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - KDDI Corporation

incident_updates.body: The KDDI Corporation network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 September 2023 at 11:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from KDDI Corporation Japan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2023 at 16:30 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
